# Government Tender Announcement

## Boiler Replacement - Central Experimental Farm - Ottawa


### Invitation to Tender: Request for Proposal

* **Tender Reference:** 01B46-23-159
* **Amendment Number:** 7
* **Publication Date:** October 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 9, 2023, 2:00 pm (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 20, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** January 12, 2024

### Overview

The Centre d'expérimentation agricole (Central Experimental Farm), located in Ottawa, requires the replacement of existing boilers with new hot water boilers to meet the heating and hot water needs of one of its buildings. The successful contractor will be responsible for the purchase and installation of two boilers.

### Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to contractors in Canada under the [1]Accord de libre échange canadien (Canadian Free Trade Agreement).

### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to contractors from across Canada, with the work being performed in Ottawa.

### Regions of Delivery

The work will be performed in Ottawa.

### Contracting Entity

* **Name:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Address:** 2001, Robert-Bourassa, Montreal, QC H3A 3N2, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Claudia Lauzier
* **Email:** claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (438) 455-2392
* **Fax:** None

### Attachments

* Invitation to Tender
* Terms and Conditions
* Centre d'expérimentation agricole (CEF) Map 2014
* Amendment 01 - New Closing Date

### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit will be held on Friday, October 27, 2023, at 10:00 am (EDT). Contractors are required to attend.
